subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Hoppertunity was scratched from the Kentucky Derby because of a foot injury, a heartbreaking development for a couple in Pasadena, Calif., and a reporter.
snippet: Hoppertunity was scratched from the Kentucky Derby because of a foot injury, a heartbreaking development for a couple in Pasadena, Calif., and a reporter.
